Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UI
    UI class defines an interface for both CLI and GUI.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionHandler
    ActionHandler class handles the answers from the server notifying the correct part of the GUI or CLI through property change listeners.
    ActionParser
    ActionParser class handles the user input, converting it in a message for the server.
    Cell
    Cell class is a simplified representation of the gameBoard's space in model.
    ClientBoard
    ClientBoard class is a simplified representation of the gameBoard in model.
    ConnectionSocket
    ConnectionSocket class handles the connection between the client and the server.
    InputChecker
    InputChecker class checks the correctness of the input received from the ActionParser, returning either true or false.
    ModelView
    ModelView class contains a small representation of the game model, and contains linking to the main client actions, which is invoked after an instance control.
    SocketListener
    Method SocketListeners listens for a server answer on the socket, passing it to the client model class.
